resources.string: I wish you a happy life

JalIhara is the go-to mobile app for art enthusiasts. Easily discover, select, and purchase tickets for captivating live performances. Our technology enhances art\'s accessibility and inclusivity, bringing it closer to hearts and minds worldwide.

JalIhara\'s vision is to be the global leader in art ticketing, enabling easy access to diverse art performances. We foster a love for the arts, connecting artists and audiences, and contribute to the global growth and appreciation of art.

Our mission at JalIhara is to revolutionize art ticketing, providing an immersive platform for easy access and purchase. We prioritize user experience, offering personalized recommendations, secure transactions, and timely event reminders. Our goal is to enrich lives by connecting users to the transformative power of art effortlessly.
For more infomations about buying tickets to your favorite art performances with JalIhara, visit
Jl. Pakuan No. 3, Sumur Batu, Kec. Babakan Madang, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat 16810
